table-style: .header,.info-table th{background-color: #fef7f1}.btn,.info-table a{text-decoration: none}.btn,.info-table th{font-weight: 600}body,html{margin: 0;padding: 0;box-sizing: border-box}table{border-spacing: 0;line-height: 1.5}.container{max-width: 600px;margin: 0 auto;border: 1px solid #e5e5e5;border-radius: 8px}.header{text-align: center}.header img{width: 100%;border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0}.header h1{font-size: 26px;color: #e04f16;margin: 10px 0 0}.content{padding: 20px 30px}.content h2{font-size: 18px;color: #333;margin-bottom: 15px}.otp{font-size: 30px;font-weight: 700;color: #e04f16}.divider-content{height: 1px;width: 80px;background: #eaecf0}.info-table{width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;margin-top: 20px}.info-table td,.info-table th{border: 1px solid #e5e5e5;padding: 10px;text-align: center}.info-table th{color: #333}.info-table a{color: #2980b9}.btn{display: inline-block;margin: 20px 0;background-color: #e04f16;color: #fff !important;padding: 10px 20px;border-radius: 5px}.footer{border-top: 1px solid #ddd;text-align: left;justify-content: center;padding: 20px;color: #777}.support-footer{display: flex;gap: 8px;align-items: center}.logo-support{padding-top: 4px}.support-footer a{text-decoration-color: #e04f16;color: #e04f16;margin-left: 5px;text-underline-position: from-font}.fs3{font-size: 4px !important}.fs4{font-size: 4px !important}.fs5{font-size: 5px !important}.fs6{font-size: 6px !important}.fs7{font-size: 7px !important}.fs8{font-size: 8px !important}.fs9{font-size: 9px
